attributes.action: stop child benifit after 3rd child, pay full rate for child one and two then 50% reduction on child 3.
attributes.additional_details: stop child benifit after 3rd child, pay full rate for child one and two then 50% reduction on child 3.If people want more than 3 children they have to make the decision based on if they can afford it, also stops long term benifit claimers from knocking out more children to get bigger houses and more income.
